distinctive_characteristics: Classic coarse grain structure of older emulsion [oai_citation:0‡l-camera-forum.com](https://www.l-camera-forum.com/topic/52068-exposure-latitude-question-tri-x-v-t-grain-films/#:~:text=I%20do%20not%20agree%20that,commensurately%20greater%20ability%20to%20enlarge)

Silver-halide crystals ~0.2–2.0μm form visible grains ~10–30μm [oai_citation:1‡tmax100.com](https://www.tmax100.com/photo/pdf/film.pdf#:~:text=EEEvvvaaallluuuaaatttiiinnngggPPPr%20rrooopppeeerrrtttyyy%20MMMeeeaaasssuuurrreeeddd%3F%3F%3F%20Fundamental%20Particles,Human%20Vision%20Details) [oai_citation:2‡tmax100.com](https://www.tmax100.com/photo/pdf/film.pdf#:~:text=being%20real,grain%20is%20far%20larger%20than)

HP5 Plus uses a traditional cubic grain structure, giving a gritty, organic look [oai_citation:3‡timlaytonfineart.com](https://timlaytonfineart.com/2025/06/08/ilford-hp5-plus-400-film-guide/#:~:text=,%E2%80%9Catmospheric%E2%80%9D%20character%2C%20especially%20when%20pushed)

Kodak T-Max 400 uses T-Grain (tabular) emulsion for extremely fine grain and sharp detail [oai_citation:4‡timlaytonfineart.com](https://timlaytonfineart.com/2025/06/08/ilford-hp5-plus-400-film-guide/#:~:text=%2A%20Look%20%26%20Feel%3A%20T,midtone%20separation%20and%20detail%20retention)
T-Max 100 delivers extremely fine grain (T-Grain) and very high sharpness

Delta 400 uses tabular (T-Grain) emulsion with core-shell technology for fine grain [oai_citation:5‡bluemooncameracodex.com](https://bluemooncameracodex.com/film-fridays/ffilforddelta400#:~:text=qualities%20it%20brings%20to%20your,at%20least%20twice%20their%20thickness) [oai_citation:6‡bluemooncameracodex.com](https://bluemooncameracodex.com/film-fridays/ffilforddelta400#:~:text=with%20less%20grain%20and%20great,in%20a%20finer%20grained%20appearance)
FP4 Plus is a classical moderate-speed film with fine grain and low contrast
Pan F Plus is known for its extremely fine grain and high sharpness
Acros 100 is prized for its ultra-fine grain and high sharpness
Neopan 400 provides classic grain structure with moderate speed
Neopan 1600 yields heavy grain but preserves high speed
Acros II 100 provides very fine grain and smooth tonal gradations

Portra 160 offers fine grain and neutral color reproduction (Kodak: 'world’s finest-grain' [oai_citation:7‡business.kodakmoments.com](https://business.kodakmoments.com/sites/default/files/files/resources/e4050_portra_400.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Micro,speed%20color%20negative%20film))

Portra 400 uses T-Grain emulsions for very fine grain and excellent scanning compatibility [oai_citation:8‡business.kodakmoments.com](https://business.kodakmoments.com/sites/default/files/files/resources/e4050_portra_400.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Micro,speed%20color%20negative%20film)
Portra 800 maintains surprisingly fine grain for ISO 800, producing natural colors
Kodak Ektar 100 is noted for extremely fine grain and vivid color rendition
Kodak Gold 200 is a consumer film with noticeable grain and warm colors
Kodak UltraMax 400 is a budget 400-speed film with relatively coarse grain
Fuji Pro 400H yields pastel green hues and moderate grain
Fuji Pro 160S is a daylight-balanced film with mild grain and natural colors
Fuji Superia 400 is a consumer film known for its balanced colors and moderate grain
Fuji C200 (Reala) yields natural colors with fine grain
Fuji Natura 1600 is an ultra high-speed film with noticeable grain

Velvia 50 is renowned for its extremely fine grain and vivid colors [oai_citation:9‡ishootfujifilm.com](https://www.ishootfujifilm.com/uploads/VELVIA%2050%20Data%20Guide.pdf#:~:text=%E2%80%A2%20Fine%20Grain%20Quality%2F%20,as%20with%20the%20current%20Velvia)
Velvia 100 delivers high saturation and fine grain suitable for landscapes
Provia 100F is a professional slide film with high neutrality and fine grain
Provia 400X is a rare high-speed slide film with grainier appearance
Kodak Ektachrome E100 provides vivid colors and relatively fine grain

Cinestill 50D is a fine-grained color film (Kodak Vision 3 50D) with prominent red halation [oai_citation:11‡analog.cafe](https://www.analog.cafe/r/cinestill-50d-35mm-c-41-film-review-l0tw#:~:text=CineStill%2050D%20is%20a%20relatively,red%20halos%20around%20bright%20highlights)

unique_artifacts: Known for strong red halation around lights [oai_citation:12‡analog.cafe](https://www.analog.cafe/r/cinestill-800t-film-review-dske#:~:text=CineStill%20800T%20is%20the%20world%E2%80%99s,range%2C%20and%20accurate%20colour%20reproduction) [oai_citation:13‡analog.cafe](https://www.analog.cafe/r/cinestill-800t-film-review-dske#:~:text=You%20may%20also%20notice%20that,red%20halos%20around%20bright%20light)

distinctive_characteristics: Cinestill 800T has very fine grain (Kodak Vision 3 500T base) and distinct red halation [oai_citation:14‡analog.cafe](https://www.analog.cafe/r/cinestill-800t-film-review-dske#:~:text=CineStill%20800T%20is%20the%20world%E2%80%99s,range%2C%20and%20accurate%20colour%20reproduction)
Lomography Color 800 is known to resemble Kodak Portra 800 in performance
Agfa Vista 200 is a budget film (Kodak ColorPlus rebrand) with noticeable grain

Ferrania P30 is famous for its extreme sharpness and very fine grain [oai_citation:15‡oldtimefocus.com](https://oldtimefocus.com/ferrania-p30-film-review-with-sample-photos-analysis/#:~:text=Ferrania%20P30%20is%20famous%20for,On) [oai_citation:16‡oldtimefocus.com](https://oldtimefocus.com/ferrania-p30-film-review-with-sample-photos-analysis/#:~:text=,gives%20a%20really%20unique%20look)
Kodak Plus-X is a classic mid-speed film with fine grain and smooth tonal gradation
